sources.title: The Locked Door
sources.description: Title: The Locked Door Summary: On her first anniversary Ann Reagan finds that her sister-in-law is involved with a shady character from her own past, and determines to intervene. Directed by: George Fitzmaurice Actors: Rod La Rocque, Barbara Stanwyck, William Production Company: George Fitzmaurice Productions Release Date: 16 November 1929 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 While Ann and the son of her boss are out on a ship beyond the 12-mile limit, which allows liquor to be consumed, the son, Frank makes unwanted advances towards her. While she is fighting him off, the ship is raided and the passengers herded ashore. Eighteen months later Ann is celebrating her one year anniversary to Lawrence Reagan when her young sister-in-law announces she is in love, and it turns out to be Frank. Ann decides to save her husband's sister from a fate worse than death, and goes to Frank's apartment to prevent an elopement. Lawrence also goes to the apartment that night, and everyone is entangled in a crime of passion.

sources.title: The Locked Door (1929) BARBARA STANWYCKüçï ROD LA ROCQUE
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Barbara Stanwyck, Rod La Rocque, William 'Stage' Boyd
Director: George Fitzmaurice
On the night of her first wedding anniversary,  a woman discovers her sister-in-law is entangled with a slimy lounge lizard from her own past. Desperate to protect her family, she steps into a web of deceit, scandal, and suspense that only Pre-Code Hollywood dared to explore!

Welcome to Friday @PizzaFLIX! Tonight it's a gripping Pre-Code Hollywood thriller starring legendary Barbara Stanwyck in her earliest leading role, alongside Rod La Rocque, William 'Stage' Boyd, and the always memorable Zasu Pitts. Directed by acclaimed filmmaker George Fitzmaurice, this suspenseful mystery showcases the darker, edgier side of early Hollywood.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

üçï Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every Friday on PizzaFLIX.

sources.title: The Locked Door (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. Pre-code crime-drama The Locked Door follows a young Barbara Stanwyck as a naive girl in the wrong place at the wrong time, with her past eventually catching up to her. While critics were not impressed by the overall plot, Stanwyck and comic relief Zazu Pitts both received acclaim for their roles in this picture.¬†¬†

metadata.Plot: While Ann and the son of her boss are out on a ship, the son, Frank makes advances towards her. Whilst fighting him off, the ship's raided and the passengers herded ashore. Almost 2 years later, Ann's celebrating her anniversary to when her sister-in-law announces she's in love - and it turns out to be Frank. Ann decides to save her husband's sister from a fate worse than death,
